channel.title: Omfg i think someones hacking my server!
channel.description:
Okay.. someone keeps spawning items and there not admin. Items keep appearing on ground and when you pick them up you get nothing.
And I just seen someone type an admin only code.. and it worked for them cause they were wearing that same outfit...AND THERE RIGHTS WERE 0!!!
Someone help me, I don't know what to do.
I keep getting these types of thingies on my runeserver thing
[code]. LOADED: 3 [client-2-lol]: playerCommand: commands [client-2-lol]: playerCommand: pureeq [client-2-lol]: playerCommand: army [client-2-lol]: Prayer Usage - ItemID: 6082 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3871 ClientHandler: Accepted Connection Fully Client type: low memory version UserId: 52363128
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\Jordan.pimp\My Document s\my server stuff\adminpk\trades.txt (The system cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:26015) at client.process(client.java:14699) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:58)
java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17300) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15072) at client.process(client.java:15042) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:58) Phonescape Server [fatal] - exception
[/code]
What's wrong ffs!

item.title: Omfg i think someones hacking my server!
item.dc:creator: @Stilles Stilles
item.description:
@Stilles wrote:

I dont think you have to fix anything, its just a missing file. If you want, change the directory to wherever your trade logs are. I really dont think its necessary to do anything. Keep on playin!

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg i think someones hacking my server!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, take this for example.

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17300)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:15072)
        at client.process(client.java:15042)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
        at server.main(server.java:58)

it means something tried to do something on a null object, and it happened on line 17300 of ‘client.java’.

Then some other stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg i think someones hacking my server!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Stilles is right about it being unable to log the trade. You don’t have a file for it to log the trades to.

[code].
LOADED: 3
[client-2-lol]: playerCommand: commands
[client-2-lol]: playerCommand: pureeq
[client-2-lol]: playerCommand: army
[client-2-lol]: Prayer Usage - ItemID: 6082
ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3871
ClientHandler: Accepted Connection Fully
Client type: low memory version
UserId: 52363128

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\Jordan.pimp\My Document
s\my server stuff\adminpk\trades.txt (The system cannot find the path specified)

    at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method)
    at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:26015)
    at client.process(client.java:14699)
    at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
    at server.main(server.java:58)

java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17300)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:15072)
at client.process(client.java:15042)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:58)
Phonescape Server [fatal] - exception
[/code]

That second error is most likely because it was unable to open the file, the FileInputStream it’s trying to close is NULL.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg i think someones hacking my server!
item.dc:creator: @Stilles Stilles
item.description:
@Stilles wrote:

Um, i thought commands, army, and i dont know about pureeq or whatever, but commands and army are public ones are they not?

[code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\Jordan.pimp\My Document
s\my server stuff\adminpk\trades.txt (The system cannot find the path specified)

    at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method)
    at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:26015)
    at client.process(client.java:14699)
    at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
    at server.main(server.java:58)

java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17300)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:15072)
at client.process(client.java:15042)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:58)
Phonescape Server [fatal] - exception
[/code]

That is just saying it cannot find the path, duh. Its not hacking. From what i can tell, its just the server trying to log the trade.

Read full topic
